original_title: Memorial service today in remembrance of late French envoy
original_body_lines: A memorial service in remembrance of the late Ambassador Jean-François Pactet of France to Sri Lanka will be held today at St.Mary’s Church, Lauries Road, Colombo 4, commencing at 10 a.m.  Monsignor Brain Udaigwe, Apostolic Nuncio of the Holy See to Sri Lanka, will lead the memorial service.
